InfluenceRule.name: People with a good reputation give advice
Brainy People give advice
Arrogant People like give advice
If I am sympathetic to you I am going to give you advice
If I am kind to you I am going to give you advice
If I pity you I will give you advice
If I'm confident I will give you advice
*** I'm a bully and I don't like you -- my advice is to get out of my face
*** I'm full of energy and we're such good friends! Let me tell you how to take YOU even further!
I feel superior to you
I feel superior to you
I feel superior to you
I'm A blunt person
*** I'm a cold person, so the way that I solidify friendships is by giving them advice
Insecure people give less advice
Mopey people give less advice
Deep people give a whole lot of advice
Inarticulate people have a hard time giving advice
Domineering people love to give advice
Humble people are less likely to give advice
Hotheaded people are likely to blurt out advice
vengeful people don't like to give advice
competitive people don't like to give advice
Embarrassed people dont like giving advice because they are self aware.
If you are a cheater and not a swinger, you don't feel qualified to give advice
*** I'm lovestruck, but I'm not particularly in love with you, so I feel like expounding on love to you to give you hope
*** I'm a bratty popular person, and you are also a popular person, and we are friends, but I also kind of dont like you, so i will give you so called friendly advice
People who feel guilty dont like to give advice
If I have a crush on you, I am less likely to give you advice
*** If I'm angry at you but we're friends, I'm more likely to give you advice, preferably to make you less frustrating to me
*** If I'm angry at you but we're friends, I'm more likely to give you advice, preferably to make you less frustrating to me
If I feel grateful towards you I am much less likely to give you advice -- you are perfect already
*** We are still dating and I like you, but I am also cheating on you. However, if only you were a little more like the person i am cheating on you with, you would be great
*** If you have consistently done lame things to me in the past i will confront you about it
*** If you have consistently done rude things to me in the past i will confront you about it
*** If you have consistently done embarrassing things to me in the past i will confront you about it
Really want to advise people in complex relationships with
I am confident I will be able to take your advice
I am insecure than I will accept that your advice is true
I am dumb and therefore resistant to advice
I am domineering and therefore resistant to advice
I am humble and I like receiving advice
I am arrogant and I do not like receiving advice
I am defensive and I really do not like receiving advice
I am a hothead and therefore resistant to advice
I am selfdestructive and therefore resistant to advice
I am competitive and therefore resistant to advice
I am stubborn and therefore resistant to advice
Im embarrassed and don't like hearing advice
Im cheater and don't like hearing advice
Im cheater and don't like hearing advice
Im anxious and appreciate hearing advice
I'm on the honor roll and don't like hearing advice
I'm looking for trouble, your advice is not appreciated
I feel guilty, maybe some advice would be appreciated
I feel out of a place -- some advice to put me in my place might be nice!
*** I am feeling heartbroken and would love some kindly advice from a good friend
*** I pity you, so I don't want to hear advice from you
*** I envy you, so I am less likely to accept advice from you
I trust you, so I am likely to accept your advice
*** I feel superior to you, so I am going to spurn your advice
If you've been rude to me in the past, I think that I am not going to listen to your advice
*** If I'm love struck and you've done something romantic in the past, I am more likely to listen to your advice
*** If I'm a class clown and you've done something funny in the past, I am more likely to listen to your advice
*** If I'm a bully and you've done something badass in the past, I am more likely to listen to your advice

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% gave %r% some good advice about proper dental hygiene
%i% lectured %r% about oral hygiene
%list(i,r,and)% dissed phonies
%i% tried to lecture %r% about phonies and got totally burned
%i% gave %r% perspective on %pron(r,his/her)% friends
%i% tried to tell %r% to ditch %pron(r,his/her)% friends
%i% told %r% to stand by %pron(r,his/her)% %gender(o,man,woman)%
%i% tried to lecture %r% about cheating
%i% lifted %rp% spirits
%i% dissed %rp% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend
%i% gave %r% some advice on how to get with the times
%i% gave %r% some timely advice
%r% shot %i% down even though %prons(i,he/she)% %pron(i,was/were)% just trying to give %pron(r,him/her)% some advice
%i% gave %r% some unwanted advice
%i% advised %r% to take some self-defense classes
%r% got bored of %ip% rant and took off with %o%
%o% %pron(o,was/were)% too pissed at %i% to listen to %pron(i,his/her)% inspirational advice, but %rs% did
%i% told %r% to stand up to %o%
%i% gave advice to %list(r,o,and)%
%r% did not approve of %ip% story on how to steal from the Mariano store
%i% told %r% that %is% had flirted with %rp% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend, %o%
%i% pushed %r% to hook up with %o%
%i% told %r% to get out of %pron(r,his/her)% crappy relationship with %o%
%i% made up stories about %o% in order to make %r% jealous
%i% failed to translate some old country advice for %r%
%i% gave some old country advice to %r%
%i% like claimed %r% would be visited by three ghosts
%r% agreed to give %o% another chance for the sake of %pron(r,his/her)% %gender(i,boy,girl)%friend
%r% just couldn't imagine taking %ip% advice to become friends with %o%
%i% told %r% it was cool if %pron(r,he/she)% hung out with %o% more often
%i% failed to make nice with %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%'s friend, %r%
%i% advised %r% to back off %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(o,man,woman)%
%r% slapped %i% for advising %pron(r,him/her)% to forget about %o%
%i% told %r% to break it off with %o% for good
%i% gave %r% some words of wisdom
%i% spouted some boring crap at %r%
%i% gave %r% some relationship advice
%i% tried to get %r% into %CKB_((i,likes),(,),())%s
%i% tried to get %r% into %CKB_((i,likes),(r,dislikes),())%s
%r% told %i% %prons(i,he/she)% could pry %pron(r,his/her)% %CKB_((i,dislikes),(r,likes),())%s from %pron(r,his/her)% cold dead hands

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%. Hey.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Not much. Look, don't take this the wrong way, but I can't help but notice that your teeth have been yellowing. Do you brush twice a day?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, not always...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You gotta take care of your smile, you know? And make sure you floss after every meal too. Show your gums some love! You don't want to lose your teeth.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No way! Thanks %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's what I'm here for.
%r%. Hey.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can't help but notice that your teeth have been yellowing. Do you make sure that you brush twice a day?
You should.
And make sure you floss after every meal too.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I do, geez! Yeesh, will you leave me alone? You sound like my mom.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, there are so many phonies out there.
Don't ever be a phony man. Just be as you are. You don't need to change for other people. You are who you are, and that's your business. Its what makes you REAL.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: To heck with fakes, man! We gotta stay true to ourselves!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, there are so many phonies out there.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't ever be a phony man. No one likes a faker. I mean seriously, you don't need to chase fads and stuff just to please people.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Basically, don't be like you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%. I was just thinking about your friends. They aren't the best people, are they?
I mean, like %o%.
I mean this in the best way possible: maybe you should make some different friends. You know. People who suit the real you better.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Maybe you're right.
Thanks for your perspective.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%. I was just thinking about your friends. They aren't the best people, are they?
I mean, like %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I mean this in the best way possible: maybe you should make some different friends. You know. People who suit the real you better.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %o% is my friend, man.
Unlike some people.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, what the heck, you're cheating on %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, well...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's so wrong. You gotta stand by your %gender(o,man,woman)%. When your %gender(o,man,woman)% gets grumpy, you stand by 'em.
When your %gender(o,man,woman)% looks at someone else, you stand by 'em.
When your %gender(o,man,woman)% trips up and accidentally sends you a decapitated fish in the mail, you stand by 'em!
And if your %gender(o,man,woman)% should shoot that %gender(o,man,woman)%ly body out a cannon through a brick wall into an arsenic factory...?
You totally stand by 'em.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're right. I should do something about this.
Thanks, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, what the heck, you're cheating on %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, well...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's so wrong. You gotta stand by your %gender(o,man,woman)%. When your %gender(o,man,woman)% gets grumpy, you stand by 'em.
When your %gender(o,man,woman)% looks at someone else, you stand by 'em.
When your %gender(o,man,woman)% trips up and accidentally sends you a decapitated fish in the mail, you stand by 'em!
And if your %gender(o,man,woman)% should shoot that %gender(o,man,woman)%ly body out a cannon through a brick wall into an arsenic factory...?
You totally stand by 'em.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, but %o% is hot.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Hey chum... why so glum?,What's going on lately? You seem so sad.,Hey... is something the matter? You've seemed gloomy lately.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, you know. This and that. I don't want to talk about it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: OK, I won't pry. But I just want you to know that I'll always be here for you. High-school isn't easy, and things have been even crazier than usual with the Prom coming up.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Life has become a battleground, and my feelings are the casualities.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're a great %gender(r,guy,girl)%, %r%, a real class act! You just gotta own it! Turn that frown upside down and place a grin upon your chin. If you start thinking positive, pretty soon you're gonna feel positive.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Heh, thanks %i%. That's good advice.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And most of it rhymed!
Look, %r%. I seriously don't get what you see in %o%. I mean, do you honestly see yourself as %pron(o,his/her)% %gender(r,boy,girl)%friend?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %shocked%! What's wrong with %o%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You just don't really seem right for each other. I mean, are you really that into %pron(o,him/her)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hmmm. Maybe you're right. Thanks, %i%. Looks like I've got some thinking to do.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Any time, %buddy%.
Look, %r%. I seriously don't get what you see in %o%. I mean, do you honestly see yourself as %pron(o,his/her)% %gender(r,boy,girl)%friend?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Excuse me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You just don't really seem right for each other. I mean, are you really that into %pron(o,him/her)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: For your information, %i%, %o% and I are %random(in love,very serious,extremely serious)%. And our relationship isn't any of your business.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %pejorative%, I just call them like I see them.
%greeting% %buddy%. Hey look, I don't mean to be rude, but you're a friend, so I feel I should say something.

It's about your %random(shoes. They're kind of embarrassing. You should really find a pair,haircut. It's... it's not very good. You really ought to get one next time,SkimddIt profile. It's really kind of embarrassing. I mean... twelve different embedded music videos? You should really make one,backpack. It has to go. You've had that thing since junior high and it totally shows. You need a bag,phone. That thing is embarrassing. I mean it has actual buttons and can only use built-in ringtones. Soooo uncool. You need to get one)% that's a little more... %random(modern,up to date,contemporary,fashionable,you,trend-setting)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You really think so? OMG, I'm so embarrassed.

%random(Thanks for telling me,I appreciate the advice,I appreciate it,Thanks a lot,Thanks for being honest,Thank you for levelling with me)%, %i%... %random(I'll really think about it,I'll think about what to do,I'll have to brainstorm)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(That's what I'm here for.,No problem!,What are friends for?,Glad I could help.,My pleasure!)%
Hey, %buddy%... I'm glad I caught you, I've been meaning to have a word with you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: About what?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, I don't know quite how to say this, but... %random(you have terrible breath,you have really bad B.O.,you've had a piece of toilet paper stuck to your shoe all day,someone posted a picture of you with braces at a Kandy Kids concert on SkimddIt,a bird seems to have pooped on the back of your head,you keep saying 'it's a doggy-dog world' but the phrase is actually 'dog eat dog' world,you keep saying 'expresso' but the word is actually 'espresso',when you walk you look like you aren't bending your knees at all and it's really super creepy,you kind of tend to spit a lot when you talk and it's sort of gross)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? Oh my god, thanks for telling me. I'll take care of it right away.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Least I could do.
Hey %buddy%, can I tell you something? It's going to be hard to hear, but someone has to say it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh? About what?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's %random(your fashion sense,the way you wear the same outfit every day,your haircut,the way you just stand around here moping and gossiping all the time and never do anything productive,your generate attitude lately,your lack of respect for our friendship,the way you smack your lips when you talk,)%. %random(You really ought to take care of that,It's annoying everybody actually,It's really getting on my nerves,You should think about how it makes you come off to other people)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(What,Excuse me,Come again,Are you kidding me)%? That's the stupidest thing I've ever heard.
%random(If I wanted your advice I would have asked for it.,Especially coming from *you*,I don't need advice from *you*,I don't need any damn advice,Take your advice and get out of my face)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Wow,Geez,Well,Sorry)%, %random(I was just trying to help,Just trying to help out a friend,I didn't think you'd take it like that,no need to get angry,what's your problem,don't blow a fuse,get a grip on yourself)%.
Hey %buddy%, I'm glad I caught you. I've been worried about you. Can I give you some advice?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, sure.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You need to %random(break out of your self-defeating cycles and learn to start loving that person in the mirror again,accept your natural born mediocrity and understand that even average people can change the world,learn to channel your anxieties about relationships into a more proactive attitude,stop fighting who you are and get comfortable with both your masculine and feminine sides,accept that you'll probably never have the ideal body image you want and that that's okay)%. As a great man once said, '%random(Carpe diem,Be all you can be,Today is the first day of the rest of your life,Smiles are contagious,Turn that frown upside down,Ich bin ein Berliner,When life gives you lemons...,You can't take it with you,You only live once)%.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you, %random(my therapist,my mother,the best friend in some cheesy movie,Ghandi,Mother Theresa,Mister Rogers)%? If I wanted advice from you I would have asked for it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Just trying to help,Just trying to help a friend,I can see my help is not wanted here,Well if that's your attitude...,Well this is the last time I try to do you any favors,I can see I'll have to save my advice for someone who'll actually appreciate it)%.

Instantiation.name: GiveAdvice - (SS2 Act-1) Tough Get Going Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%. Hey, why so gloomy?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, it’s %o%. %gender(o,He,She)% keeps bullying me and I’m really sick of it.
I mean, just now %toc1%. I wish %pron(o,he/she)%’d just leave me alone.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %buddy%, can I give you a word of advice? You’ve got to stand up to that %pejorative% or %pron(o,he/she)%’ll just keep walking all over you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But what I can I do?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, did you see that flyer advertising self-defense classes? You should go to the next one. Might be useful.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well.... okay. Thanks, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No problem.
You know what I hate %r%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's that?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: People that ignore other people's advice.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh huh.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Never become like that. Don't be one of those people who pretend like they are listening but just disregard everything you say.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: What are you guys talking about?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i% is just going on about something unimportant. Hey, let's go see what's going on over there.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey guys. I heard this amazing advice from my PE teacher.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: He says, never give up on something... I think. Something like that.
Oh, and don't forget to exercise.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Why should we listen to any advice you give? You're such a %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Calm down, I think %i% has a good point.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: I can't believe you're listening to this poser. I'm out of here.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's okay %i%. I thought it was good advice. %o% can be a %pejorative% sometimes.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%. What's going on?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not much. %o% has been kind of annoying lately.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You shouldn't take that from %pron(o,him/her)%. Show %pron(o,him/her)% what's up.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i% was just giving me some advice.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Yeah, and what stupid advice could %pron(i,he/she)% have?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: He said for you to quit being a %pejorative% and get out of our faces.
Just get out of here... Loser!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey guys. What's going on?
Well whenever I'm feeling down, I just say in my head that tomorrow will be a better day.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: And what if tomorrow doesn't get any better?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... there's always another tomorrow.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: See, even %i% thinks it will be all better. Don't give up yet.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I guess I shouldn't. Thanks for the advice.

Instantiation.name: GiveAdvice - (SS6 Act-3) Monica gives advice on how to steal clothes from Mariano.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Have you ever been to the Mariano store at the Easthouse Mall?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, the place is pretty expensive though.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well you could always steal things from there. It is easy to do.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: When I stole this top a few days ago I just walked out with it.
The cashier did run after me but he was just giving me back my phone that I dropped.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Stealing is wrong %i%. I can't believe you stoop that low.

Instantiation.name: GiveAdvice - (SS7 Act-2) Give Advice - Person from Act 1 is trying to give advice to his friend, who rejects it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What's wrong %r%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I feel like %o% and I aren't that close.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't worry about it %gender(r,man,girl)%. I'm sure its just a phase.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why would %pron(o,he/she)% be acting like this though?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's probably because I hit on %pron(o,him/her)% earlier, maybe.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You did what?!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't get too bent out of shape about it, it was just some harmless talk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't believe you. I'm out of here.

Instantiation.name: GiveAdvice - Swinger with romance up Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%. I noticed you've been checking out %o% at lot lately.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Is it that obvious? ...I don't know what to do. Should I say something? What if %pron(o,he/she)% doesn't like me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You worry too much, %r%.
Just go out there and take what you want, before it's too late. Don't worry about who's dating who or who's saving what for when.
Because soon we'll all be like twenty-five and our social lives will be basically over! So you squeeze everything out of your love life you can right now while you've still got it!
GO! What are you waiting for! Precious seconds of youth are slipping away!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thanks, %r%. Maybe I will say something to %pron(o,him/her)%.

Instantiation.name: GiveAdvice - Give Advice to break up a loving character Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%. How are you and %o% doing?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Umm, you know, we are doing okay. I love %pron(o,him/her)% and stuff.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Do you? You don't seem that happy with the relationship.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't just give up on %pron(o,him/her)%. I have to believe it will work.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %buddy%... if it's not working out, maybe it's just not meant to be. You should it end it now rather than letting it drag on and on.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You might be right. Maybe it is time to move on.
Thanks, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Say %r%, you and %o% are a pretty neat couple, aren't you?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah... I guess you could say that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I guess a couple like you wouldn't break up for anything.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ummm, where are you going with this?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, just some things I heard around school. Mentions of %o% doing some things. Other %gender(r,boys,girls)% were involved.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You don't know what you're talking about.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Bathroom gossip never lies. But I guess you can believe what you want.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...I have to... go check some things out.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Too easy.
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You looked like you needed some advice. In my country, we tell people %positiveadj% when they need advice.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What does that mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I believe in your language it means '%random(never walk a duck,three barons are better than four viscounts,six hens in a hut are worth twelve geese in a house)%.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That doesn't seem like very good advice at all.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe the translation doesn't go as well in english.
Hello %r%. Is something wrong? You seem unhappy.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%. Oh, just a little down.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: In my country, we like to say '%positiveadj%.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Umm, what does that mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: The translation is difficult. The best way to say in your language is maybe...
'Live each day as a fire, and let your troubles be the fuel.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's... that's pretty great advice, actually. Thanks, %i%.

Instantiation.name: GiveAdvice - (SS8 Act-1) Marley tells Scrooge of the upcoming marvelous night.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I've been meaning to tell you, %r%...
It is required of every man, that the spirit within him should walk abroad among his fellowmen, and travel far and wide.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Bah! That sounds like the kinda thing %o% would nag me about. Only creepier.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: If that spirit goes not forth in life, it is condemned to do so after death!
This afternoon, you will be haunted by three spirits.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, your advice is kinda creeping me out %gender(i,dude,girl)%. Speak comfort to me, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You shall know that abandoning %o% forged several links on your already ponderous chain, %r%.
Goodbye, %r%.
Hey %r%, we need to talk.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up %sweetie%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's about %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why do we need to talk about that %pejorative%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I want you to give %pron(o,him/her)% a chance. %o% and I are friends, and I don't want to have to choose between you two.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: *sigh* Okay, %sweetie%. For you. I'll try.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, we need to about %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why are you bringing that %pejorative% up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %gender(o,He,She)% is my friend. I think you should give %pron(o,him/her)% a chance.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you choosing %pron(o,him/her)% over me, is that it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No! I don't want to choose sides. I just want us all to be happy.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well you certainly aren't on my side. I need alone time now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's going on %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, I feel obligated by social law to like you since you're my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%'s friend.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Umm, okay? So don't you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sure! I mean... I just wanted to say I know you and %o% are good friends, so don't stop hanging out because of me. I mean, I don't have exclusive rights over %pron(o,him/her)% or anything. %gender(o,He,She)%'s your friend too.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, thanks for saying that. I appreciate it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I feel obligated by social law to like you since you are my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%'s friend.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So, you're just trying to become friends with me because of %o%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sure, I mean, it would make things a lot less awkward, right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, see, I like to actually like my friends. Call me crazy. Maybe we should just keep our relationship the way it is now...

Instantiation.name: GiveAdvice Reject - advising the person who's homewrecking you

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %pejorative%, a word of advice.
You best check yourself before my fingernails slowly and painfully claw your eyes out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... isn't that 'before your wreck yourself?'

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No. Because it won't be *you* wrecking yourself.
It'll be me.
You better call off this 'thing' you think you have with my %gender(o,man,woman)%, sleazebag.
%o% is *mine*.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: We'll see about that, %pejorative%.

Instantiation.name: GiveAdvice Reject - advising the person you're homewrecking

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r% %gender(r,my boy,honey)%, can I talk to you a minute?
I'm sure you know about me and %o% by now. I want you to know it was nothing personal.
But a word of advice. Let %gender(o,him,her)% go.
%gender(o,He,She)% and I are just meant for each other. There's no future for %o% and %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wow, %i%, I'm glad we had this little talk.
It makes me feel even better about wishing you were dead.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, I can see we won't be able to settle this like mature adults. Maybe I'll come back when you've-
You'll regret that, you %gender(r,sleazeball,skank)%.
%r%, we have to talk.
This thing with you and %o%. It has to end. It's killing us.
I don't know what you see in %pron(o,him/her)% and I don't want to know. I just want you to myself again.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh %i%. I never meant to hurt you. %o% means nothing to me. Nothing!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Then call it off. Be %gender(r,a man,strong)% and end it.
Or there's no future for us any more.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thanks for being honest with me, %i%. I've got a lot of soul-searching to do.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I've got a great playlist for that.

%greeting% %r%. %random(Look,Say,So,Hey)%, %random(can I offer you,can I give you,do you mind if I give you,would you like,can I just give you)% %random(some advice,a piece of advice,a word of advice)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Sure.,Not at all.,Shoot!,What?,I guess.,What is it?,Go for it.,Okay.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Always look both ways before crossing the street!,Never look a gift horse in the mouth.,Do what you love and the money will follow.,An apple a day keeps the doctor away!,It doesn't matter if you win or lose; it's how you play the game.,When life gives you lemons make lemonade!,Good things come to those who wait.,Don't put off until tomorrow what you can do today!)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Uhhh,Errr,Well)%... %random(thanks I guess,it's the thought that counts,that's really sweet,I appreciate the sentiment,that's good to remember)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(No problem,Any time,You know it,That's what I'm here for,My pleasure,I've got a million of 'em,Just keepin' it real,Word,Peace out)%.

%greeting% %r%. %random(Look,Say,So,Hey)%, %random(can I offer you,can I give you,do you mind if I give you,would you like,can I just give you)% %random(some advice,a piece of advice,a word of advice)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Oh god.,No.,No thanks.,I'd rather you...,I don't really...,I don't think...)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Always look both ways before crossing the street!,Never look a gift horse in the mouth.,Do what you love and the money will follow.,An apple a day keeps the doctor away!,It doesn't matter if you win or lose; it's how you play the game.,When life gives you lemons make lemonade!,Good things come to those who wait.,Don't put off until tomorrow what you can do today!)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Why don't you shove your cliches up your cliche hole?,That's the stupidest thing I ever heard.,Are you calling me fat?,Are you calling me stupid?,Are you coming on to me?,Is that supposed to be some kind of insult?,This is boring.,This is stupid.,Whatever.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(I just call 'em like I see 'em,Just an observation,Just thought that might be useful for you,There's more where that came from,Just keepin' it real,Word,Peace out)%.
%r%, can I offer you a word of advice?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, sure.
Uh... yeah?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: They're great. You should seriously consider getting one.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... well, it couldn't hurt. Sure, %i%, I'll think about it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, a word.
This obsession of yours with %toc1%s has got to stop. Everyone is sick of hearing you bla%random(bb,th)%ering on about them all the time.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You can pry my %toc1%s from my cold, dead hands.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can see this is a lost cause.
%r%, can I offer you a word of advice?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, sure.
Uh... yeah?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: They're great. You should seriously consider getting one.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Actually, I'm not really a fan of %toc1%s, to be honest.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're dead to me.
